data.title: School News – Transfiguration – St. Stanislaus Kostka
data.text:
Tuition, Fees and Financial Aid

St. Stanislaus Kostka Catholic Academy of Queens

A co-ed Catholic elementary academy serving nursery age through 8th-grade children in Maspeth, Queens61-17 Grand Avenue / Maspeth, NY 11378

(718)326-1585

www.ststanscaqn.org

What makes St. Stan’s special?

Dedicated staff and faculty

Learning in fully air conditioned classrooms

One to One Academy with iPads in K-Grade 2; Chromebooks in Grade 3 – 8

Early Childhood: 3K and 4K for All Programs

Technology to differentiate education

State of the art STREAM Lab

Special Subjects including: Art, Music, Physical Education, Spanish STREAM & Technology

Full time SETSS provider

In school speech and occupational therapy

Guidance counselor

Full-time nurse

Title 1 services

Before-and After-school programs

Free breakfast and lunch

Student Leadership Committee

Algebra I Regents Course

Security cameras at every entrance

Strong and active Board of Directors

Dedicated support from affiliated parish

Stan’s Performing Arts Players

We at St. Stan’s are so proud of all we have to offer. We are proud of our tradition of academic excellence and religious formation. At St. Stan’s faith is not only taught but also shared and experienced every day through prayer and service to school, church and community. The mission of St. Stan’s is to provide students with the knowledge needed to succeed and the values necessary to pursue goals and contribute to the betterment of the community and the world at large.

We recognize that each of our students is a precious gift, and we are blessed to be a part of their growth and development. We work in concert with families to ensure that our students are given all they need for success.

There are wonderful learning experiences on the horizon at St. Stanislaus Kostka CAQN!

Click here to request additional information

PARTIAL ASSISTANCE TUITION AVAILABLE; call 718-326-1585 for more information
